original_text: And the flood was forty days upon the earth; and the waters increased, and bare up the ark, and it was lift up above the earth.
korean_text: 홍수가 땅에 사십 일 동안 계속된지라 물이 많아져 방주가 땅에서 떠올랐고

sentences.original_text: And the flood was forty days upon the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 홍수는 땅 위에서 사십 일 동안 있었으며

sentences.original_text: and it was lift up above the earth
